name: Data Breach
description:
Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam 3 in a week with the theme "Less is more".

How does it fit the theme? well, the less abilitys you have = the more places you can explore!

You play as the only robot left armed with the code to cure the spacecraft from the c-199 virus. One problem - every time you upload your code, you will lose one of your movement options. Will you be able to save the ship and humanity in general? Find out in DATA BREACH!

follow Qwide on twitter: @JustQuide

Play my game on google play: VirusBuster by RudbergStudios
